  function.
- Remove compilation warning.

This commit fixes a potential bug in dJointXXXGetInfo1. The limit value is not updated and keeps its old value if the Hi and Lo limits are changed.
Unit test are also included.

The functon declaration of dBodyGetWorld in objects.h and in ode.cpp
were not matching and this was giving the unresolved external. const dBodyID is equivalent to dxBody *const and not to const dxBody *

message.raw: Added "dCheckConfiguration", a reference helper that'll parse the configuration string for you; Made drawstuff output the configuration string to the console on startup. The aim here is to provide better technical support for users by giving them the ability to report their setup; This required drawstuff to link with ODE, at least on Windows - I've refreshed premake project configurations to enable this. I'm not sure if automake users will have the same problem, please verify; Updated demo_heightfield to use dCheckConfiguration.

I'm not sure if automake users will have the same problem, please verify; Updated demo_heightfield to use dCheckConfiguration.

I'm not sure if automake users will have the same problem, please verify; Updated demo_heightfield to use dCheckConfiguration.

message.raw: Reapplied the trimesh enabling change from #1374 which got caught up in the GIMPACT/double rollback of #1379. dTRIMESH_ENABLED is not publicly available since the build reorganisation changes (and no other demo uses it) and so the demo would never work properly.
message.html: Reapplied the trimesh enabling change from #1374 which got caught up in the GIMPACT/double rollback of #1379. dTRIMESH_ENABLED is not publicly available since the build reorganisation changes (and no other demo uses it) and so the demo would never work properly.

summary.raw: Reapplied the trimesh enabling change from #1374 which got caught up in the GIMPACT/double rollback of #1379. dTRIMESH_ENABLED is not publicly available since the build reorganisation changes (and no other demo uses it) and so the demo would never work properly.
summary.html: Reapplied the trimesh enabling change from #1374 which got caught up in the GIMPACT/double rollback of #1379. dTRIMESH_ENABLED is not publicly available since the build reorganisation changes (and no other demo uses it) and so the demo would never work properly.

values.message: Reapplied the trimesh enabling change from #1374 which got caught up in the GIMPACT/double rollback of #1379. dTRIMESH_ENABLED is not publicly available since the build reorganisation changes (and no other demo uses it) and so the demo would never work properly.
